rooms.description: You are in a dimly lit stone chamber. The walls are cold to the touch, and the air is damp. To the north, you spot an old wooden door. In the center of the room, there's a mysterious chest that seems to have a keyhole.

items.name: chest
items.description: A large wooden chest with intricate designs. It's locked and seems to need a key.

useEffects.silver key: The chest unlocks and inside you find treasures beyond your wildest dreams!

rooms.description: You've entered a small room. It seems like a storage chamber of sorts. Old crates and dusty shelves line the walls. Sunlight pierces through a small crack in the ceiling. On a table in the corner, you notice a shiny silver key.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A shiny silver key with intricate engravings on it.
